RACE.RACE_TEXT: All American Oaks Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 440 Y Dirt CR: 92. Derby Trial Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLD FILLIES THAT WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE FOR THE 2023 ALL AMERICAN QUARTER HORSE OAKS. Weight: 126 lbs. All horses must enter for the trials on Sunday, August 6, 2023 by 11:00 A.M. and pay the $1,400 entry fee. Late nominations o f $30,000 which will include all fees will be accepted at time of entry into the trials. The ten fastest qualifiers will advance to the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List for the final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARTEL KISSES broke out, off slow, angled out, steady close, drew clear, best. A LUCKY LADIE bumped start, steady bid. SWEET EMYLOU bumped both sides start, closed. LIL MISS EMMA vied throughout, not enough. PINK KISS broke in, bumped. MISS FDD in contention, hung. DASHING DIAMOND broke out. LEGACY CARTEL off a step slow, evenly. STYME clear path, no bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Cartel Kisses
ENTRY.OWNER: Rice Larry L and Rice Bobbie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, off slow, angled out, steady close, drew clear, best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: All American Oaks Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 6 440 Y Dirt CR: 95. Derby Trial Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLD FILLIES THAT WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE FOR THE 2023 ALL AMERICAN QUARTER HORSE OAKS. Weight: 126 lbs. Late nominations o f $30,000 which will include all fees will be accepted at time of entry into the trials. The ten fastest qualifiers will advance to the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List for the final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FEARLESS MOON dueled, bore out, prevailed. POLITICAL ROYALTY came in start, dueled throughout. FG JESS JESS broke in air, vied, outfinished. AJ FAST CORONA close throughout. PAINTED SEIS broke in. BLUES GIRL crowded stretch, lost path. LADYS CHOICE stumbled start. TEAR IT UP outrun. Following a rider's objection, FEARLESS MOON was disqualified and placed sixth for causing interference in the stretch. PER RULING FROM THE NEW MEXICO RACING COMMISSION, THE DISQUALIFICATION OF FEARLESS MOON HAS BEEN REVERSED.

ENTRY.NAME: Tear It Up
ENTRY.OWNER: Sanchez Pablo and Ochoa Gabriel G
